title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 576.2 - Application of new york state law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 576.2 - Application of new york state law

State Regulations
(a) A violation of any section of the Vehicle
and Traffic Law shall be a misdemeanor or traffic infraction as designated in
such law, and shall be punishable as therein provided. (b) Such laws and orders adopted by State

University shall be enforced in any court having jurisdiction. (c) A complaint regarding any violation of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law or any traffic ordinance applicable on such
premises shall be processed in accordance with the requirements of applicable
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
576.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
